CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , a city in PERSON .
CARDINAL . A retiree of ORG , in CARDINAL the applicant contested in court a stoppage of his pension .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of PERSON ordered the Ministry to resume the pension in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) per month , to pay arrears in the amount of RUB PERSON , and to adjust the arrears for the cost of living by paying RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL . This judgment became binding on DATE with the exception of the cost - of - living adjustment , this part of the award having been quashed on appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG once again awarded the cost - of - living adjustment in the same amount . This judgment became binding on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant requested bailiffs to enforce the judgment of DATE . On the ORG ’s request , from DATE to DATE the enforcement proceedings were stayed pending proceedings in ORG . On DATE the judgment was enforced in the part concerning the resumption of the periodic payments .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant requested the bailiffs to enforce the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant requested the bailiffs to enforce the judgment of DATE in the part concerning the arrears .

CARDINAL . Meanwhile , on DATE the ORG requested a supervisory review of the judgments , and on DATE ORG of PERSON stayed the enforcement . On DATE the Presidium of ORG quashed the CARDINAL judgments on supervisory review . The ORG rejected the applicant ’s claim , having found that the court below had misinterpreted material laws concerning the applicant ’s entitlement to the pension .
The applicant was absent from this hearing , because he had allegedly not been properly notified of it .
CARDINAL . NORP Under section CARDINAL of LAW of DATE , a bailiff must enforce a judgment within DATE . Under section QUANTITY of LAW of DATE , ORG must enforce a judgment within DATE .
